title: VAR Madness in Italy
description:
The FC crew take a look back to Juventus' 2-2 draw with Salernitana after camera angles not available to VAR exposed that the Bianconeri's game winner was wrongfully disallowed. Plus, the guys preview tomorrow's UCL matches as Barcelona try to win their first match away to Bayern Munich while Chelsea and Liverpool look to get back into the win column.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Revisiting Juventus' wrongfully disallowed winner; Xavi isn't worried about Barca's trip to Bayern; Who should start for Brazil in the World Cup?
